scripts.publish_lambda: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js single && zip -rq archive_newest.zip compiled_binaries build node_modules/del node_modules/sloc && cp archive_newest.zip zips/archive_$(date +%s).zip && aws --profile ncf lambda update-function-code --function-name shield-redirect3 --publish --zip-file fileb://archive_newest.zip
